EmailTemplate.subject: Testing Your Way to a Happy DevOps Marriage
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
The marriage of Development and Operations is not always a happy one. DevOp’s ability to produce perfect cycles of continuous integration is only as strong as its weakest link: Testing. Without the ability to test better - not harder - the DevOps marriage quickly falls apart.
Tricentis’ Tosca Testsuite gives you the tools for a successful DevOps relationship: allowing you to optimize your risk coverage, manage your test data, and automate your software testing efforts so your DevOps can thrive.
Interested in learning more? You can read about maximizing your DevOps experience with Tricentis’ Tosca Testsuite here <http://www.tricentis.com/solutions/devops/>!
Best regards,
